page.title: 14Worship in Coddenham Area
page.content: Services are held every Sunday in the 3 Christian Churches in this area and Coddenham Church runs a children's Sunday School. St Mary's Coddenham and St Gregory's Hemingstone together with two adjoining parishes are united in one benefice of the church of England, to which a new Rector was inducted on 25 April 1985. On this occasion Coddenham Church was packed but the regular average congregation is 30-40 persons and Hemmingstone, half this number. Harvest Festival attracts the greatest number of worshippers. The Methodist Chapel in Coddenham is part of the Ipswich circuit; services are conducted by the Minister once a month and otherwise by lay people; about 16 in the congregation. The main concern of Church members is how to heat and maintain their ancient buildings. Fund raising events are well supported.
